insert into db_proxy.sardine_serialarch
uuid,
code,
name,
companyUuid,
version, CREATEDTIME, CREATEDID, CREATEDCODE, CREATEDNAME, LASTMODIFYTIME, LASTMODIFYID, LASTMODIFYCODE, LASTMODIFYNAME,
#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{companyUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{version,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{createInfo.time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createInfo.operator.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createInfo.operator.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createInfo.operator.fullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModifyInfo.time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastModifyInfo.operator.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModifyInfo.operator.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModifyInfo.operator.fullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.insert:
insert into db_proxy.sardine_serialarchline
uuid,
code,
name,
companyUuid,
serialArchUuid,
version, CREATEDTIME, CREATEDID, CREATEDCODE, CREATEDNAME, LASTMODIFYTIME, LASTMODIFYID, LASTMODIFYCODE, LASTMODIFYNAME,
#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{companyUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{serialArch.uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{version,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{createInfo.time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createInfo.operator.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createInfo.operator.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createInfo.operator.fullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModifyInfo.time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastModifyInfo.operator.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModifyInfo.operator.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModifyInfo.operator.fullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

insert into db_proxy.sardine_serialarchlinecustomer
customerUuid,
serialarchlineuuid,
lineOrder,
#{customer.uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{serialArchLineUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{order,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.select: select t.* from db_proxy.sardine_serialarchlinecustomer t where t.serialarchlineuuid=#{lineUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and lineorder > #{order,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select t.* from db_proxy.sardine_serialarchlinecustomer t where t.serialarchlineuuid=#{lineUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and lineorder < #{order,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select t.* from db_proxy.sardine_serialarchlinecustomer t where t.serialarchlineuuid=#{lineUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by lineorder
select t.* from db_proxy.sardine_serialarch t where t.uuid=#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
